channel.title: Black Mesa to Garry's mod
channel.description: Hey! I just bought Black Mesa:Source and copied the models and materials into Gmod. I also copied the map, the one in which that reactor (Stormtron, I think) comes up. But when I press the button that usualy powers up the reactor, nothing happens, just a sound. I hope you guys got the solution for my problem. Thanks a lot!

item.title: Black Mesa to Garry's mod
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Well, he could’ve torrented it, be unaware that it’s free and trying not to admit he “pirated” it.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa to Garry's mod
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Starvis:

Hey!
I just bought Black Mesa:Source and copied the models and materials into Gmod. I also copied the map, the one in which that reactor (Stormtron, I think) comes up. But when I press the button that usualy powers up the reactor, nothing happens, just a sound. I hope you guys got the solution for my problem. Thanks a lot!

You actually bought the mod? If that’s true, you just got scammed hard.

Black Mesa is completely free.

Read full topic

item.description:
I can’t believe you bought the game.

item.title: Black Mesa to Garry's mod
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
GMod requires all Black Mesa’s shaders before it can render the models properly. And sadly, the shaders are incompatible with Source 2009, so someone would have to make them all from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa to Garry's mod
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Black Mesa does not work properly with Gmod 13, unless someone creates a gamemode or addon for it.
Get over it.

Read full topic
